title: How to Flirt with an Aquarius Man

steps.title: An Aquarius falls fast when you two have brainy chats.
steps.content: An Aquarius falls fast when you two have brainy chats. While other signs of the zodiac might be drawn in by looks, he finds intelligence extremely seductive. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. He also crushes on anyone who can bring up different topics and stay curious about the world. If you give him an interesting subject to think about, then he won’t be able to get you out of his head. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. He’ll perk up if you ask a hypothetical question like, “Would you rather overcome your greatest fear or never have to face it all?” Bring up a matter you’ve always wondered about and make a comment like, “Sometimes I’m not sure if social media keeps us more connected.” Dive into your backgrounds or how your pasts shaped you. Say something like, “Do you feel like you learned more about yourself during your childhood or in college?” Love astrology? Take this quiz to discover your soulmate’s sign.

steps.title: Impress him with your intense interest.
steps.content: Impress him with your intense interest. He loves to feel like what he says matters. If you give him strong eye contact, you’ll send shivers down his spine. Also use body language that says you’re engaged, like leaning in and smiling. Then, give a reply that proves you were really listening—you’ll really reel in your favorite Waterbearer. Show you’re immersed in what he’s saying. For instance, raise your eyebrows when you’re shocked by one of his stories. Touch him when the moment feels right. For example, hold onto his shoulder when he opens up. Provide specific and sincere feedback—point out something like, “I think you should apply for the promotion! With all your experience in accounting, you sound like a perfect fit!”

steps.title: Aquarian men have a soft spot for a true humanitarian.
steps.content: Aquarian men have a soft spot for a true humanitarian. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. His heart will race when he thinks about all the ways you’ll both change the world. Talk about small ways you can make your community a better place as well as any big dreams you have. If you’re passionate about volunteering and outreach, he’ll think you’re a true gem. Start off with a comment like, “It’s important to me that society really values arts and culture.” Work up his desire to learn more about you and share a vision like, “I want to do my part to protect animals, so I’m volunteering at the local animal shelter.” Blow him away with an ambitious plan like, “I want to be part of the task force to make community college free.”

steps.title: The Waterbearer adores anyone who brings up their passions.
steps.content: The Waterbearer adores anyone who brings up their passions. He’ll be smitten if you gush about whatever makes you happy, especially if it’s obscure or underrated. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 23 December 2021. Ultimately, an Aquarius is all about confidence and curiosity. He’ll develop a serious crush if you have the courage to try out new activities. [5] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Whether you talk about what you’ve always loved or just discovered, he’ll be happy to listen. “It feels like no one’s heard of the cover band Smashing Squash, but when I discovered them, I was obsessed right away! I’ve followed all their music from the beginning of their career!” “I go to fencing classes on Thursdays and circus school on Saturdays! I’m always looking for new physical challenges.” “I love to collect vintage mystery books! I really feel like they have the best plot twists!”

steps.title: If they’re funny, thoughtful, or mysterious, they’ll impress an Aquarius.
steps.content: If they’re funny, thoughtful, or mysterious, they’ll impress an Aquarius. Make him laugh with a clever meme, a ridiculous one-liner, or an inside joke. Or, grab his interest in a different way and share a random reflection. Finally, you can just give him a cliffhanger and make him wonder about your answer. Use subtle seduction techniques like these and he’ll start to pine over you: “I used to have a handle on life, but then it broke! Help me build another? 🪵 🪚 🔨” “Do souls exist? Or is consciousness just a bunch of chemicals in our brain? 🧪” “I wonder if you know how I see you…”

steps.title: His heart will skip a beat when you notice how he works a crowd.
steps.content: His heart will skip a beat when you notice how he works a crowd. While he chases after anyone who’s a sparkling conversationalist, he also wants to shine. Give him the opportunity to enchant others with his stories and perspectives. He’ll love that you got to see him at his very best. Praise him with a compliment like, “Your take on switching to clean energy was incredible! I bet they’re all rushing to get an electric car now!” Bring up his effect on others and say something like, “You had everyone in the room mesmerized!” Point out specific people skills he has and make a comment like, “You’re so thoughtful and invested in what someone has to say. I really appreciate that about you.”

steps.title: He worships anyone who’s also outgoing.
steps.content: He worships anyone who’s also outgoing. When you win over the people who are closest to him, you’ll steal his heart. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Show a genuine interest in their lives and remain excited about everything they have to say. Since he cherishes everyone in his inner circle, he’ll appreciate that you can make them feel so comfortable. If you can hold a conversation without his help, he’ll be attracted to how you carry yourself. When he sees your eyes light up as you talk to others, he’ll develop a huge crush. End a get-together with lots of hugs—he’ll melt when he sees how warm you are.

steps.title: He’ll love that you like how irresistible he is and aren’t threatened.
steps.content: He’ll love that you like how irresistible he is and aren’t threatened. When an Aquarius man teases others with suggestive comments, he’s just playing around. It's just second nature for him to boost everyone's ego. Tell him that you think it’s cute—when he sees how secure you are, he’ll only have eyes for you. Chat about how other people crush on him. Say something like, “Did you see how she looked at you?! She’s totally head-over-heels. I can’t blame her—that’s a great suit.” Show you notice his charms and make a comment like, “You can seduce anyone with just one smile, can’t you?” Share that he has a powerful effect on you and make a confession like, “Wow! That mischievous smirk makes me blush!” [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: This air sign warms up to you in a fun, friendly atmosphere.
steps.content: This air sign warms up to you in a fun, friendly atmosphere. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. An Aquarius isn’t impressed by over-the-top elegance or fine dining establishments that scream “romance.” Instead, he’s way more comfortable with low-key places, like pizza joints or coffee shops. These environments give him the sense that he’s seeing the real “you.” He likes to take his time, so a relaxed setting helps him feel like he isn’t rushed. He feels like you’re creating a sweet memory that he’ll look fondly upon in the future. Take him to a regular haunt of yours, like a brewery, so he knows where you unwind.

steps.title: He wants to think he’s the romantic hero in your story.
steps.content: He wants to think he’s the romantic hero in your story. The air sign prides himself on how clever he is, so allow him to pursue you. Let him dream up your first date, use a smart one-liner on you, and thrill you with sweet words or gestures. When you let him think sparking up romance was his idea the whole time, he’ll be on cloud nine. Give him lots of positive feedback when he suggests a date. Say something like, “I’d love that! I can’t think of anyone I’d rather go with!” Swoon over his compliments—for example, if he tells you that he adores your taste in movies, say, “Thank you! You’re so sweet to let me go on and on about the classics…” Appreciate him for his effort with words like, “You brought tiger lilies?! I can’t believe you remembered that I said they were my favorite! That was weeks ago.”

steps.title: The adventurous Aquarius will feel a deep connection with you.
steps.content: The adventurous Aquarius will feel a deep connection with you. Even after he’s dialed up the romance and starts to date you, the Waterbearer doesn’t want to be tied down—reassure him that you can go with the flow. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Bond with each other over outings with friends or spontaneous getaways. He’ll feel like he’s found a kindred spirit. Be casual about him taking some space for himself. Make a comment like, “Camping for a week sounds amazing! I bet it’ll be great to be unplugged from everything.” [10] X Research source Tell him how you’ll treat yourself, too. Share a plan like, “I’m going to head up to a beach house with my best friends and make the most of the weekend!” Talk about your philosophy on independence and say something like, “I think it’s a must to have your own life, even when you’re dating.”

steps.title: Aquarian men crave a partner who’s unpredictable.
steps.content: Aquarian men crave a partner who’s unpredictable. He doesn’t need anything extravagant—all he wants is a bit of the unexpected. Randomly drop by his place with takeout and a board game, or book classes for a fun activity, like mixology lessons. When learns how exciting you are, he’ll get extremely attached to you. Act casual when you surprise him. Take him on a really creative date. For instance, you might make an exciting treasure hunt for him . Listen for key details, then use them when you dazzle him. For example, if he says that he loves video games, get him a bestseller and throw in some DLC (downloadable content). Be spontaneous. During an evening stroll, switch gears and visit a museum after hours if it’s hosting a special event.

steps.title: The air sign wants truth and transparency, so he’ll cherish your confession.
steps.content: The air sign wants truth and transparency, so he’ll cherish your confession. After you’ve already had several dates, it’ll be time to open up. Say your connection feels like it's more than a fling and that you’d like to explore its potential. Be open to any possibility and you'll inspire him. Chat about how you developed feelings over time—this will sound very sincere. Say something like, “I always saw you as a close friend, so it was surprising when you asked me on a date…” Specify when you knew that you fell for him. Make a comment like, “Our long, late-night chats left a strong impression on me. My heart’s really opened up now.” Finally, be clear about your intentions. Suggest something like, “I’d love to focus on just seeing you. I think that would bring the most joy to my life right now.” Want more insight into your Aquarius crush?
